docstring.long_description: Requires a CONNECT_2450 block to create the connection.
docstring.short_description: Sweeps current or voltage and measures the opposite for the 2450.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_2450 block).

parameters.name: sweep
parameters.description: Select the sweep mode, the opposite unit is measured.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The first x value of the sweep.

parameters.name: stop
parameters.description: The last x value of the sweep.

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: The number of points between start and stop.

parameters.name: measurement_time
parameters.description: How long to measure a single point, in seconds.

parameters.name: measurement_delay
parameters.description: How long to delay between two points, in seconds.

parameters.name: y_limit
parameters.description: The limit of the measured value.

parameters.name: source_range
parameters.description: The range of the x value.
